attributes.action: Give feedback within 28 working days on email contacts with the Prime Ministers Office
attributes.additional_details:
The ePetitions website invites emails to be sent to the Prime Ministers Office - after sending many asking for him to respond on matters which are of importance to myself and others I have NEVER received a response.

Pray explain to we mere mortals why there is any point in inviting questions and comments from us, directly to your office, if you cannot be bothered to respond to them?
